attributes.legal-text:
This title has been converted from the original PlayStation® disc to the PS3™ systems. Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation® disc version, or where some features may not function properly. This version does not support PlayStation® peripherals (controller, memory card, multitap, etc.), therefore functionalities such as multiplayer, versus, and co-op modes are not available.

©NovaLogic, Inc. NovaLogic, the NovaLogic logo and Delta Force are registered trademarks of NovaLogic, Inc. The Delta Force Logo, Urban Warfare logo, and Urban Warfare are trademakrs of NovaLogic, Inc.

Rebellion and the Rebellion logo are registered trademarks of Rebellion Development Ltd.

All other trademarks and logos are property of their respective owers.

"PlayStation" and the "PS" Family logo are registered trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Purchase indicates acceptance of the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service/User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase this item. One time fee for use on downloads on 5 activated PS3™ systems.
attributes.long-description:
Playable on PS3™ only

You are a lone Delta Force® operative, John Carter, who must eliminate terrorists who may be hidden behind any door, and halt a global threat.

Your adventure will encompass wild shootouts to stealth tactics, and include close-quarters combat, strategic infiltration, time-sensitive ops, sniping, and demolition. As you engage with dangerous enemies who pursue you; using your own blood trail. Armed with assault and sniper rifles, grenade and rocket launchers, plus remote explosives, it will be up to you to calm this global threat. Other black ops gear includes night vision and thermal goggles, combat radar, and a security camera scrambler that will help you save the world

During 12 missions you will intercept communications, capture prisoners, conceal enemy bodies, blast your way out of a bank robbery, rescue and protect hostages, defuse explosives, and attack an oilrig--All in hopes of saving the world. Are you up for the challenge?

Delta Force®: Urban Warfare™ (PS3™ only)
attributes.name: Delta Force®: Urban Warfare™ (PS3™ only)
